name: Project Forest Demo V1
description:
Welcome to Project Forest! This is a game where the world has been completely destroyed by robots, and the only live area has now been invaded. Your mission is to destroy robots by attacking them with your sword, save the lost Souls and restore peace to the Forest.

Remember this is still a work in process, and the experience shown here is very short.

Don't forget to give feedback and ideas to make this game the best it can be!
